name: World 100 Annual Conference 2024
content: The THE World 100 Annual Conference offers a key opportunity for members to share reputational achievements. The conference offers invaluable networking opportunities in a relaxed and informal atmosphere. It allows members and non-members to exchange innovative perspectives on reputation, international relations, and global brand building. Attended by vice-presidents, directors and heads of communications, marketing and international relations at top universities, the conference welcomes both members and non-members. New members are always encouraged to contribute presentations, enabling them to promote their brand profile to some of the most important influencers in higher education. Time: 8:45 AM - 5:00 PM Venue details: B15 2TT, Birmingham, England, B15 2TT, United Kingdom Category: Conferences | Education | Higher Education Price: General Admission: GBP 900.00
